alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:43PM EDT until August 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pulaski County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Fulton County in north central Indiana... Southeastern Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Marshall County in north central Indiana... * Until 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/. * At 442 PM EDT/342 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hamlet to near Knox to near Medaryville to near Collegeville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Winamac, Argos, Culver, Pulaski, Walnut, Oak Grove, Ripley, Kewanna, Monterey, Leiters Ford, Beardstown, Ober, Hibbard, Winona, Delong, Lake Bruce, Donaldson, Star City and Tiosa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
